org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop

Class HadoopDefaultJobInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.HadoopDefaultJobInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, HadoopJobInfo

    public class HadoopDefaultJobInfo
extends Object
implements HadoopJobInfo, Externalizable
    Hadoop job info based on default Hadoop configuration.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

public String property(String name)

      • createJob

        public HadoopJobEx createJob(Class<? extends HadoopJobEx> jobCls,
                             HadoopJobId jobId,
                             IgniteLogger log,
                             @Nullable
                             String[] libNames,
                             HadoopHelper helper)
                      throws IgniteCheckedException
        Creates new job instance for the given ID. HadoopJobInfo is reusable for multiple jobs while HadoopJobEx is for one job execution. This method will be called once for the same ID on one node, though it can be called on the same host multiple times from different processes (in case of multiple nodes on the same host or external execution).
        Specified by:
        createJob in interface HadoopJobInfo
        Parameters:
        jobCls - The job class.
        jobId - Job ID.
        log - Logger.
        libNames - Optional additional native library names.
        helper - HadoopHelper.
        Returns:
        Job.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • hasReducer

        public boolean hasReducer()
        Checks whether job has reducer. Actual number of reducers will be in HadoopMapReducePlan.reducers().
        Specified by:
